::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.cell}

:::

This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**SM1.3 Sea caves**](/efg-info/SM1_3.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/SM1_3_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: SM1.3.web.grid v3.0.

> Marine ecoregions (Spalding et al. 2008) containing occurrences of rocky coastline (see MT1.1) were verified by inspection of imagery available in Google Earth to identify an envelope of potential distribution for sea caves. The coastlines within these ecoregions were summarised using a template of 1-degree grid cell intersected with the coast. As caves represent a small portion of such coastlines, all mapped areas were designated as minor occurrences.

::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

:::



### Datasets

**MEOW-2008** (Spalding MD et al.  2008):

Source of _biogeographical range_.
 Resolution: variable (polygons), static.
 Accuracy evaluation: qualitative (experts judgement).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

:::

### Processing

Processing steps used in this map are: *Selection* :: *Buffering*.

### Map evaluation


This map is considered to be a ***Coarse quality map*** based on the following characteristics:

Concept alignment is *Indirect,general*.

Ground observations are _NA_.

 The accuracy evaluation *Qualitative expert assessment,undocumented*.

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Indicative Map (**code: SM1.3.IM.grid**, version v3.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: SM1.3.web.grid**, version v3.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**SM1.3.IM.grid** (v3.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SM1.3.IM.grid_v3.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**SM1.3.web.grid** (v3.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SM1.3.web.grid_v3.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091037){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.SM1_3_web_grid){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
